dct_title_s: Map of Kashmir with part of adjacent mountains : Surveyed on the basis of the Great Trigonometrical Survey of India, under the instructions of Lieutt. Colonel A.S. Waugh, engineers. F.R.S. F.R.G.S., 1st assistant G.T. Survey of India and The Assistants under his orders during 1855, 56 & 57. Scale of miles half an inch to one mile
dct_description_sm: Relief shown as hachures and heights in feet.; Includes inset of Kasmir route map.; Glaciers and beds of perpetual snow are shown in emerald green.
Scale 1:63,360. Scale of miles, half an in. to one mile.
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
